name: ZEMPS_ProjectX
description:
OUTLINE
Experience different worlds with the main character who is on a quest to acquire super powers, experiencing issues along the way.

Afterall, power is nothing without control!!!

LEVEL NAME & OVERVIEW
Level1_Intro = Acquire power(s)
Level2_RoboticJustice = Lose power(s)
Level3_CpuWorld = Fight in a digital world with acquired power(s)
Level4_Finale = Are power(s) really needed?!?
TEST_Character = Test area for character's powers

A bonus level is provided to test the character with all available abilities, which are:
Flame = The power of fire
Force = The good and the bad
Speed = The power of velocity
Super = The power of superness
Blizzard = The power of ice
Brute = The power of strength
Invisibity =
Lantern = The power of light
Portals = The power of interdimensional travel
Space = The power of space

* Level2 introduces the character with powers stripped, though with the aid of a trusty AI motorcycle, their mission really begins!

KEYBOARD & MOUSE CONTROLS
[General Action]
Backspace = Exit level to main menu
Mouse Middle Wheel = Character camera zoom
A,W,S,D = Character mpvement
Space Bar = Jump
Tab = Next Character
Caps Lock = Pevious Character
Numpad 0 = Audio Off
Numpad 1 = Game audio: Track 1
Numpad 2 = Game audio: Track 2
Numpad 3 = Game audio: Track 3
Numpad 4 = Game audio: Track 4
Numpad + = Game audio: Next track
Numpad = - Game audio: Previous track

[Flame]
Mouse Left Button = Single flame fire from right hand
Mouse Right Button = Flame On/Off
Left Control = N/A
Left Shift= Superspeed
F = Fly
G = N/A
R = N/A
1 = Flame fire from both hands
2 = Name

[Force]
Mouse Left Button = Dome defence
Mouse Right Button = Flame On/Off
Left Control = Shield On/Off
Left Shift = N/A
F = N/A
G = N/A
R = N/A
1 = Steps of force
2 = N/A

[Speed]
Mouse Left Button = Wind gust
Mouse Right Button = Sparks On/Off
Left Control = Slowmotion
Left Shift = Superspeed

G = N/A
